description: The Blonde Phantom (Louise Grant Mason) is a fictional masked crime fighter in comic books published by Marvel Comics. Created by writer-editor Stan Lee and artist Syd Shores for Marvel predecessor Timely Comics, she first appeared in All Select Comics #11 (Fall 1946), during the 1940s period fans and historians call the Golden Age of Comic Books.  The character was ranked 98th in Comics Buyer's Guide's "100 Sexiest Women in Comics" list.
name: Blonde Phantom
